title: Hacked. Hacker spent about 3500 RP.
body:
:/ I lost my two refund tokens and $25 worth of RP. Can Riot help me get it back or...? I'm sad to play ranked because I usually play Jinx but they refunded my Star Guardian Jinx... I sent in a ticket but I don't know how long it's going to take. Is it troublesome getting hacked RP back? 
{{champion:222}}

replies.body:
> they refunded my Star Guardian Jinx.

Maybe the hacker was a support main who likes to play with sounds on.

> [{quoted}](name=GhostOfShrimpmas,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=m18yjLIH,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-24T20:50:32.921+0000)
>
> Maybe the hacker was a support main who likes to play with sounds on.

Funny, but I find the noises Kuro and Shiro make cute

Since you've already submitted a ticket, I suggest waiting for an account specialist to grab your ticket. We've had a lot of tickets submitted recently, so wait times are a bit longer than normal.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
